filesystem: Reading and writing to the filesystem.
filesystem.appendLine: Appends text and a new line to a file
filesystem.appendLine|param|text: the string to append to the end of the file
filesystem.appendString|param|text: the string to append to the end of the file
filesystem.createDirectory|param|name: full qualified path to the new directory
filesystem.readFile: Reads the contents of the file
filesystem.readToSerial: Reads the content of the file to send it to serial
filesystem.remove: Removes the file. There is no undo for this operation.
filesystem.remove|param|filename: name of the file to remove, eg: "output.txt"
